        public Result<ChunkTsp> execute(SharedState initialState,

        Description copied from class: TaskClosure
        To be implemented by inheriting tasks: Execute the task code that take inputs and do ONE of 2 things: 1. Produce a ResultTasks object that is a collection of tasks to execute OR 2. Produce a ResultValue object that is sent to the target of this task

        ResultTasks OR ResultValue
